title: Last Chance!  Call Now for Quick Move-In!
posting_body: Are you ready to be the next happy homeowner in this safe and quiet community?
We will help you through every step of the way along the road of making your dream of homeownership come true!
This two-story home features an open floor plan with three bedrooms two full bathrooms plus a powder bath.
The chef-ready kitchen includes a full suite of appliances by Whirlpool, granite countertops and espresso-stained wood cabinets topped with crown molding.
This spacious home is located only minutes from Spring.
Make an appointment now and visit this beautiful community today!
Own this new and upgraded home for less than you pay in rent!
* P & I. Price $304,900, 5.875% Fixed / 6.743% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
